django.contrib.gis.gdal.field
=============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.gdal.field

----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.field.OGRFieldTypes
   django.contrib.gis.gdal.field.ROGRFieldTypes

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Field(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.gdal.base.GDALBase`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


   .. py:attribute:: ptr


   .. py:method:: as_double()

      Retrieve the Field's value as a double (float).



   .. py:method:: as_int(is_64=False)

      Retrieve the Field's value as an integer.



   .. py:method:: as_string()

      Retrieve the Field's value as a string.



   .. py:method:: as_datetime()

      Retrieve the Field's value as a tuple of date & time components.



   .. py:property:: is_set

      Return True if the value of this field isn't null, False otherwise.


   .. py:property:: name

      Return the name of this Field.


   .. py:property:: precision

      Return the precision of this Field.


   .. py:property:: type

      Return the OGR type of this Field.


   .. py:property:: type_name

      Return the OGR field type name for this Field.


   .. py:property:: value

      Return the value of this Field.


   .. py:property:: width

      Return the width of this Field.


.. py:class:: OFTInteger(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Field`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


   .. py:property:: value

      Return an integer contained in this field.


   .. py:property:: type

      GDAL uses OFTReals to represent OFTIntegers in created
      shapefiles -- forcing the type here since the underlying field
      type may actually be OFTReal.


.. py:class:: OFTReal(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Field`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


   .. py:property:: value

      Return a float contained in this field.


.. py:class:: OFTString(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Field`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


.. py:class:: OFTWideString(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Field`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


.. py:class:: OFTBinary(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Field`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


.. py:class:: OFTDate(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Field`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


   .. py:property:: value

      Return a Python `date` object for the OFTDate field.


.. py:class:: OFTDateTime(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Field`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


   .. py:property:: value

      Return a Python `datetime` object for this OFTDateTime field.


.. py:class:: OFTTime(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`Field`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.


   .. py:property:: value

      Return a Python `time` object for this OFTTime field.


.. py:class:: OFTInteger64(feat, index)

   Bases: :py:obj:`OFTInteger`


   Wrap an OGR Field. Needs to be instantiated from a Feature object.
